sect1.title: Borrowed Parameter Declarations

formalpara.title: The parameter must have a non-primitive type
formalpara.para: This is trivially satisfied when the the receiver is borrowed.

formalpara.title: When annotating a method, the method must not be static
formalpara.para: Methods that are static do not have receivers.

formalpara.title: The parameter must not also be explicitly annotated with @Unique
A constructor with a borrowed receiver value must not also be annotated with @Unique("return")
